title: Use formula
text: The word problem implies a direct variation formula is needed. This formula is $$m=kv$$.

title: Find values
text: Since the liquid has a mass of $$16$$ kilos and has a volume of $$2$$ liters, we can assign $$m$$ to be $$16$$ and v to be $$2$$.

title: Plug in
